title: (x) Hollister/Armani Exchange - (similar to) Trisect, Pump Triline/ITC Bauhaus {David H, Marc O}
content:
Hi Guys, I was looking in many font libraries and can't find it, so please help out.   
   
I need an ID on this font: [http://www.hollisterco.com/hol/images/store/collection/3179\_01\_l.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/www.hollisterco.com/hol/images/store/collection/3179_01_l.jpg)   
   
and this shirt too: [http://www.armaniexchange.com/shopping/product/detailmain.jsp?itemType=PRODUCT&iMainCat=4&iSubCat=16&iProductID=11869&scode=100&sname=White](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/www.armaniexchange.com/shopping/product/detailmain.jsp?itemType=PRODUCT&iMainCat=4&iSubCat=16&iProductID=11869&scode=100&sname=White)
author: swtboyazn

comments.content:
Second one would be ' [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/bold/testdrive.html?s=Armani%2BExchange&p=72)', for sure.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
 [www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/bold/testdrive.html?s=Armani+Exchange&p=72](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/bold/testdrive.html?s=Armani%2BExchange&p=72)

The first one could be ' [Trisect](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0019)', but I fear, its not..   
 [www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0019](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0019)

Not an exact match, but in a similar vein...   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-2/pump-triline/testdrive.html?s=HOLLISTER&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816201600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-2/pump-triline/testdrive.html?s=HOLLISTER&p=48)
thanx guys...your help is much appreciated
